entries.title: US Navy releases first images of Chinese ‘spy’ balloon recovery
entries.description: US is carrying out an extensive operation to gather all the pieces of the device, which was shot down at the weekend.

entries.title: Zoom to layoff nearly 15% staff as pandemic wanes
entries.description: Zoom, which became a household name during lockdowns with its video-conferencing tools, has seen growth slow down.

entries.title: Chile heatwave threatens to worsen wildfires, authorities warn
entries.description: South American country is battling to contain dozens of active fires that have already killed at least 26 people.

entries.title: Microsoft takes on Google Search with AI
entries.description: Microsoft is staking its future on AI through billions of dollars of investment as it directly challenges Google.

entries.title: Residents struggle to flee quake-hit Turkish city of Gaziantep
entries.description: People who are stuck in the province take refuge in shopping malls, stadiums, mosques and community centres.

entries.title: Turkish victims buried under rubble swarm social media for help
entries.description: Thousands of messages appeal for earthquake rescues with some people pulled from the debris after posting.

entries.title: NATO role in Ukraine threatens ‘unpredictable’ escalation: Russia
entries.description: Moscow accused NATO of involvement in the war by supplying arms to Kyiv, warning supplies are 'legitimate targets'.

entries.title: Are Macron’s pension reform plans unfair to French workers?
entries.description: Strikes have been held across France to protest against proposals to raise the retirement age.

entries.title: European countries promise Ukraine more Leopard 1 tanks
entries.description: Germany, Denmark and the Netherlands say they will provide at least 100 of the weapons for Kyiv over the coming months.

entries.title: Argentina, Chile, Paraguay, Uruguay make joint 2030 World Cup bid
entries.description: South American nations to compete against joint bid by Spain, Portugal and Ukraine to host tournament in its 100th year.

entries.title: When calamities strike, it is the poor who bear the brunt
entries.description: Too often 'recovery efforts' and aid do not reach those who need them the most.

entries.title: Eagles v Chiefs: US expects record $16bn in Super Bowl betting
entries.description: More than 50 million people are expected to place bets as Philadelphia Eagles battle Kansas City Chiefs this Sunday.

entries.title: Photos: Families search for loved ones in rubble after earthquake
entries.description: Rescuers in Turkey work in freezing temperatures to dig through remains of buildings flattened by magnitude 7.8 quake.

entries.title: What you need to know about the US State of the Union address
entries.description: President Joe Biden will give speech to Congress outlining view on current state of the nation, priorities for future.

entries.title: Mapping the 100+ aftershocks from the Turkey-Syria earthquake
entries.description: Turkey has been hit by more than 100 magnitude-4+ quakes since a deadly 7.8 quake struck on February 6.

entries.title: Former British police officer jailed for life for serial rape
entries.description: David Carrick, 48, committed dozens of offences across two decades while serving in London's Metropolitan Police force.

entries.title: ‘Ambiguous by design’: What’s in the Kosovo-Serbia deal?
entries.description: Proposed settlement is focused on conflict avoidance rather than achieving lasting peace, analysts say.

entries.title: Syria longs for international aid amid earthquake devastation
entries.description: The flow of critical UN aid to northwest Syria has been halted, as politics hampers assistance to government-held areas.

entries.title: Pervez Musharraf, ex-military ruler of Pakistan, laid to rest
entries.description: Pervez Musharraf, who backed the US invasion of Afghanistan, wasburied at a cemetery in Karachi with 'military honours'.

entries.title: LeBron James eyes history as NBA scoring record within reach
entries.description: Los Angeles Lakers superstar is just 36 points away from surpassing Kareem Abdul-Jabbar as league's all-time top scorer.

entries.title: Iran unveils underground base in response to US-Israel exercises
entries.description: Iran's army also announced a new air-fired missile that it said could penetrate enemy defences at long range.

entries.title: Videos reveal extent of Turkey, Syria earthquake devastation
entries.description: Harrowing moments caught on camera provide a glimpse into the scale of the destruction and horror caused by the quakes.

entries.title: Turkey declares 3-month emergency in 10 quake-hit provinces
entries.description: Turkish president announces measure to ensure rescue and recovery work is 'carried out quickly'.

entries.title: The world is falling behind on early childhood education
entries.description: This is putting many children - especially among the poor - at a serious disadvantage.

entries.title: Can Atiku Abubakar succeed in sixth run for Nigerian presidency?
entries.description: Atiku Abubakar, Nigeria's former vice president, is promising hope and restoration if he becomes president. Can he win?

entries.title: Earthquakes batter Turkey, Syria’s historical monuments
entries.description: The earthquakes have destroyed or scarred ancient mosques and castles that previously withstood wars and disasters.

entries.title: Rage, fear in India’s Azamgarh over land acquisition for airport
entries.description: Months-old protest becomes 'fight for survival' as mainly marginalised residents of eight villages resist gov't's move.

entries.title: Footballer Christian Atsu pulled alive from Turkey quake rubble
entries.description: Ghanaian ex-Newcastle Utd winger, who plays for Turkish club Hatayspor, found alive and taken to hospital with injuries.

entries.title: Rebels claim New Zealand pilot taken hostage in Indonesia’s Papua
entries.description: West Papua National Liberation Army claimed responsibility for the attack on the aircraft and kidnapping of pilot.

entries.title: Burkina Faso gunmen kill 15 Nigerian pilgrims bound for Senegal
entries.description: The Muslim pilgrims were travelling to a religious ceremony in Senegal through conflict hotspots in the Sahel.

entries.title: Survivors give harrowing accounts of Turkey, Syria earthquakes
entries.description: As frantic rescue operations continue, survivors of Monday's deadly earthquakes and aftershocks tell their stories.

entries.title: South Korea court rules in favour of Vietnam War massacre victim
entries.description: Nguyen Thi Thanh was eight when she was shot in the stomach by South Korean marines who massacred some 70 civilians.

entries.title: Israeli forces kill Palestinian teenager in occupied West Bank
entries.description: Hamza Amjad al-Ashqar, 17, was killed after a bullet hit his face during a raid, the Palestinian health ministry said.

entries.title: Lack of jobs drives recruitment by armed groups in Africa: UN
entries.description: The UNDP report was based on interviews with hundreds of former fighters across East, West and the Horn of Africa.

entries.title: Frantic search for earthquake survivors in Turkey and Syria
entries.description: Rescuers are racing to rescue survivors from the rubble of thousands of buildings brought down by the deadly temblor.

entries.title: Russia-Ukraine war: List of key events, day 349
entries.description: As the Russia-Ukraine war enters its 349th day, we take a look at the main developments.

entries.title: Ecuador’s President Lasso accepts extradition referendum defeat
entries.description: Opposition wins mayoral races in two largest cities, adding to the president's woes.

entries.title: Turkey-Syria quake day two: What do we know so far?
entries.description: Rescue operations under way in freezing cold, a day after a magnitude 7.8 quake hit Turkey, Syria killing thousands.

entries.title: Wikipedia ban in Pakistan over alleged blasphemous content lifted
entries.description: 'Unintended consequences' of blanket ban 'outweigh benefits', says government after two days of blocking the website.

entries.title: Why are India’s poorest people being left behind?
entries.description: Wealth inequality gap between billionaires and impoverished communities is widening, economists and NGOs warn.

entries.title: China-sceptic leader of Solomon Islands largest province removed
entries.description: Daniel Suidani was known for his support of Taiwan, even after Honiara switched diplomatic allegiance to Beijing.

entries.title: Death toll rises above 4,000 after Turkey, Syria earthquakes
entries.description: Freezing weather conditions and snowfall in the devastated region have increased the difficulties for rescue workers.

entries.title: North Korea promises ‘expanded, intensified’ military drills
entries.description: Military top brass meets as armed forces continue preparations for parade expected as early as Wednesday.

entries.title: 2022 was record year for North Korean crypto theft
entries.description: United Nations report seen by Reuters says hackers have adopted increasingly sophisticated techniques.

entries.title: Deadly landslide strikes southern Peru amid heavy rainfall
entries.description: Rescue efforts continue as precipitation soaks regions like Arequipa, a centre for recent antigovernment protests.
